text: Sergey Vladimirovich Ilyushin (Russian: Сергей Владимирович Ильюшин; 30 March 1894 - 9 February 1977) was a Soviet aircraft designer and founder of Ilyushin. ==Other websites== * GlobalSecurity.org Category:1894 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Soviet engineers Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin
title: Sergey Ilyushin
